Sentencas: Quality of the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stack assembly affects power density and lifetime of the power plants.
Titulo: Processing of manganite-based contact layers for stacking of planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In the case of planar SOFCs, assembling quality depends on electrical contact between the stainless steel current collectors and ceramic electrodes of the membrane-electrode assemblies (MEAs).
Titulo: Processing of manganite-based contact layers for stacking of planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Whilst Ni meshes and paste are commonly used to provide this contact at the anode side, the cathode contact materials should be stable in oxidizing atmosphere.
Titulo: Processing of manganite-based contact layers for stacking of planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this work, mechanical pre-treatment conditions of submicron La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 +/-delta (LSM) cathode powders were optimized in order to sinter mechanically stable contacts in the course of SOFC sealing procedure without use of inorganic sintering aids.
Titulo: Processing of manganite-based contact layers for stacking of planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Excessive ball-milling time and/or rotating speed was shown to result in partial decomposition of the perovskite phase, which increases electrical resistivity of the porous layers.
Titulo: Processing of manganite-based contact layers for stacking of planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Testing of the LSM contact layers in model SOFC stack with Crofer 22H current collectors under standard operating conditions demonstrated sufficient adhesion and performance.
Titulo: Processing of manganite-based contact layers for stacking of planar solid oxide fuel cells
